Parameters: Equalizer: the Equalizer on which the interface is registered.
int: status of the set parameter operation.
int: ID of the modified parameter. See @B_android#media#audiofx#Equalizer#PARAM_BAND_LEVEL_E@ ...
int: additional parameter qualifier (e.g the band for band level parameter).
onParameterChange(android.media.audiofx..Description: Method called when a parameter value has changed. The method is called only if the parameter was changed by another application having the control of the same Equalizer engine.
onParameterChange(android.media.audiofx..FullName: public abstract void onParameterChange (Equalizer effect, int status, int param1, int param2, int value)

ClassDesc: The OnParameterChangeListener interface defines a method called by the Equalizer when a parameter value has changed.
